Books_prompt: Does the text review any aspects of a book?
Movies_and_TV_prompt: Determine whether the text is related to movies and TV reviews.
Home_and_Kitchen_prompt: Determine if the text is primarily related to home and kitchen topics. Consider if it mentions or discusses items, appliances, recipes, decor, DIY projects, or maintenance tips associated with living spaces and kitchen areas.
Electronics_prompt: Determine if the text reviews electronic products (e.g., smartphones, tablets, laptops, etc.).
Clothing_Shoes_and_Jewelry_prompt: Determine if the text reviews clothing, shoes, or jewelry. Look for mentions of specific items (e.g., dresses, sneakers, necklaces), opinions about style, fit, material quality, or customer service experiences.
